banner.description: is a product crafted for installation on pre-existing windows. The self-adhesive smart foil enables the effortless transformation of a regular window into a tinted one with just the click of a button.

desc.title: Click Tint - Smart Foil
desc.subtitle: About Click Tint
desc.desc1: Click Tint foil is a self-adhesive foil that is aplied to glass. Upon electrical aplication Click Tint foil transform itself into a
desc.desc2: Click Tint фолијата се состои од кристали кои при додавање на електричен напон се порамнуваат на една иста страна и го претвараат стаклото во провидно додека при исклучување на електричниот напон кристалите се порамнуваат така да фолијата дава мат и непровиден ефект со млечно бел боја
desc.desc3: Click Tint фолијата е достапна во ширина од 1.8м. Доколку површината која сакате да ја покриете е поголема од 1.8м тогаш се аплицираат две или повеќе фолии една до друга со меѓусебна оддалеченост од 1 милиметар.

examples.title: Say Goodbye to Wals!
examples.subtitle: Application
examples.desc: offers a contemporary solution for privacy, aesthetics, and functionality. Its user-friendly design makes this smart film a popular choice in various settings, including homes, offices, healthcare facilities, conference rooms, spa centers, hotels, malls, and more.

exampleOne.title: for a modern home
exampleOne.desc2: Click-Tint is an ideal alternative to curtains that provides privacy when you need it, while allowing more light to let you enjoy sunny days.

exampleTwo.title: for you hotel
exampleTwo.desc1: Click-Tint contributes to more comfort and luxury, making your hotel stand out from the others.
exampleTwo.desc2: Click-Tint offers an optimal solution for creating modern, dynamic partitions between rooms.

exampleThree.title: for your clinic
exampleThree.desc1: Elevate the modern aesthetic of your clinic with Click-Tint smart film. This innovative solution brings an aura of efficiency and cleanliness, coupled with a minimalist design, imparting a more professional appearance and fostering a sense of security for your patients.
exampleThree.desc2: The Click-Tint film fosters an open environment, promoting better connection with patients, all the while ensuring a high level of privacy with a simple click.

exampleFour.title: for your office
exampleFour.desc1: Opt for Click-Tint in your office space to modernize it by eliminating bulky partitions and unnecessary walls.
exampleFour.desc2: With Click-Tint, you can ensure an enhanced, modern work environment, improved focus, and minimized distractions – all with just one click

wheel.title: Why Chose
wheel.desc: Using the smart foil, you are remodeling every glass surface into a modern and functional piece.
